website_summaries.verdict: All-natural lice treatment consisting of a mint serum, treatment spray, and comb.
pros: Natural ingredients, consisting of yeast-based enzymes, olive oil, and peppermint eliminate and prevent lice infestations
Manufacturers claim it does not promote the development of resistant species
cons: Did not work to eliminate lice in a small percentage of users

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend Little bugs kits to anyone who has a lice ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical since I had tried other products with limited or no effectiveness. This kit did as advertised – it killed the live bugs and then it allowed me to comb out those darn eggs. It has been two days and no more sightings! Would recommend Little bugs kits to anyone who has a lice issue.....good luck.
customer_reviews.author: gintautas garsys

customer_reviews.title: ... first thing I noticed was that it actually smells good. Read all the directions and after about 90 ...
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed was that it actually smells good. Read all the directions and after about 90 minutes my son's lice was killed and all the eggs gone. Would buy this brand again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It worked for us
customer_reviews.text: Happy with results. I had done the regular lice treatment that I got from the store, but didn't see results. The nits were still there and head waa itchy. I cut her hair short too before treatment Used this twice and followed directions and it worked. Since it is chemical free and natural I didn't mind leaving it on my daughter's hair. I did not find any lice but she had some nits. Not sure how there can be nits without lice but it is what it is. Smells good too. I highly recommend this treatment.
customer_reviews.author: LB2309Z

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg ! I would give this product 10 stars if I could. My daughters caught head lice in school. After multiple attempts, buying different product at my local pharmacy and nothing seemed to work. I came across this product here in Amazon. I read the reviews and although still skeptical I bought one for each and wallllaaa problem solved after one treatment. And trust me I went through many products and this one finished the critters with one treatment . It really really works! I am a real mommy who struggled and finally can breath and say we are critter free. Can’t thank this product enough .
customer_reviews.author: Bianca cabrera

customer_reviews.title: It worked for us!
customer_reviews.text: I felt this was really effective for my daughter when lice made it's way through her daycare. I liked that it was natural and smelled better than traditional lice treatments. The comb seemed very good at getting the nits and the directions were clear.
customer_reviews.author: JC Beuque

customer_reviews.title: Effective, Easy-to-Use and Safe
customer_reviews.text: This kit was just what we needed in our house. It was easy to use and had simple instructions on the box for eliminating lice with their three products. There was also helpful suggestions right on the box of how to prevent lice in the future. Mostly, I love that the products are pesticide free, sulfate free and healthy for the scalp. They smell great! The mint smell is very pleasant. Would definitely recommend and use again if needed. Effective for getting rid of lice fast.
customer_reviews.author: Anne J. Johansen

customer_reviews.title: Try it. Totally worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Try this. Stop wasting your money on Nix and ruining your hair. I have two daughters with long thick hair. We had a huge ordeal last year where one brought it home we cleaned, and then as soon as everyone was lice free, the other brought it home. I had to find something that wasn’t so harsh on the hair. This worked wonders. Just know it’s gonna take a good few washes to get it out of your hair. I always “safety” treat my hair if my girls come home, and I feel okay about using this vs Nix.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I felt like this was the only thing that REALLY worked!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: This did the trick
customer_reviews.text: The comb was the so much better than the cheap plastic ones. The treatment did leave the hair with a weird greasy texture after use. It took a few washes to get it all out and hair back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Smelled good, was easy to use and best of all it worked!
customer_reviews.text: Smelled good, was easy to use and best of all it worked...hair was a little oily afterwards but after a good wash her hair was back to normal – lice and eggs were gone. The comb worked great pulling all the dead debris from the hair too. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: TheMeiers

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: I went through all the store lice shampoos and had given up hope...until I stumbled across this gem!
customer_reviews.author: S. Riddle

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Effective (only needed one treatment). Smells good. It is pesticide free and so much more effective than the brands you buy in the store. My daughter has very thick long hair and there was enough product to do her entire head.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Hallberg

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before and loved it but the one I just received definitely looked used! I will not ever use this on my children. The whole box was ripped open and no seal on any of the bottles. The comb had stuff inside the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve dreaded the day I would hear, “Your child has lice,” since my oldest went to school. When the news finally came, I tried Littlebugs on the recommendation of a friend. The directions were clear and easy to follow and it worked great! I appreciate being able to use products that don’t contain harsh ingredients – especially on my kids. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Came opened
customer_reviews.text: The product worked, though I think it was returned from a previous customer, as the box was slightly ripped. And also, the inside packaging was definitely touched. At first I tried giving the outside appearance the benefit of the doubt but the inside packaging confirmed. I still used it as I was desperate.
customer_reviews.author: Sara 1234

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and the mint is a great repellent for head ...
customer_reviews.text: A friend turned me on to this product. Smells great and the mint is a great repellent for head lice. Going to spray helmets and send to camp this summer!
customer_reviews.author: G Dillon

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical, but this worked in just 1 treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin R. Raimondo

customer_reviews.title: Buy this & be done with it!
customer_reviews.text: The only treatment that actually works & does so with one dose! This stuff is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Shanbam78

customer_reviews.title: Follow Instruction regarding subsequent comb outs
customer_reviews.text: I followed directions and it worked in one treatment. The additional comb outs cannot be skipped. It has a pleasant odor and is super easy to use. The not spray does not detangle all that well, but you can just let it sit and then add a conditioner. I'm hoping I don't need to order again, but if I do, I will definitely choose this product first next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend Little Bugs to everyone
customer_reviews.text: Finally! A kit that worked! As soon as I put the Serum on my daughters hair the live bugs stopped moving – it killed them dead in their tracks. I followed the instructions and added the Mousse afterwards and was able to comb the eggs out of hair as well. Have not seen a live bug or nit since. Yay!! I had tried many other brand kits to no avail. I would definitely recommend Little Bugs to everyone. My only suggestion for this kit is to make the instructions on the back a bit larger to read. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Gail Judziewicz

customer_reviews.title: Several treatments needed
customer_reviews.text: Seemed effective at first but they returned perhaps you need to do several treatments especially on kids
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was great. Product did not smell chemically either
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it, but wanted to be ready if we needed it. Packaging was great. Product did not smell chemically either, which I found to be a plus. Complete kit for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This worked when Rid would not. I used 3 boxes of Rid on my kids hair and it did not take care of the problem. I only had to use this one time, and the problem is resolved! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Garza

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Was very sceptical cause every product says the same thing but this one was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: HopeAkins42

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lice treatments! Only thing that worked!
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness for this stuff! Only thing that worked! The rid treatment I used originally did not work and had terrible chemical smell, I felt awful putting it on my daughter. This stuff was a way better experience, worked great on first use and the I felt way better putting it on her, wasn’t toxic like the Rid! Thank you thank you for this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Drbanakins

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: After doing exactly what the video said, it didn’t get any of the nits/eggs out of my daughters hair. Waste of money for sure! Coconut oil has done a better job that this.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: I did two treatments 8 days apart. Followed instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: I did two treatments 8 days apart. Followed instructions to the letter. It reduced the lice but did not eliminate them.
customer_reviews.author: carmen

customer_reviews.title: Tampered With
customer_reviews.text: The product looked to be tampered with. No way I'd use it on my kids. Good thing Nix had already remedied the problem.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrime User

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product at Target after reading amazing reviews and after a pesticide product didn’t work. I thought it was too good to be true but it DOES WORK! Not a living bug remained after 1 treatment and the spray does help release nits! My daughter and I both have very thick hair and it was not difficult to treat. A little messy but worth it! So impressed with this product I bought the prevention kit as well. I never write reviews but had to for this amazing product. Wish I knew about it from the start!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective!
customer_reviews.text: Littlebugs for the win! Safe and quickly effective! It was so easy to use and dare I say, made the whole lice experience a little more pleasant. The smell is actually very nice! It was SO good to know that harsh chemicals were not being used on the very littlest ones in the family. Five people are very happy to be lice free (naturally)!
customer_reviews.author: Jack_

customer_reviews.title: The best out there!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Very easy to use and effective (I have try others that weren't) and natural ingredients :)
customer_reviews.author: Jesse miller

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Went through lice with three littles for the first time. I completely panicked, called my mom crying lol (she laughed at me) Anyway I tried rid and nix, helped a little but didn’t work. BUT THIS STUFF... is a God send. I am so relieved right now. I put it on all three for a longer period than the directions state. The product smells good, not a strong smell, and made their hair so soft and detangled. I will never use a different product if this awful situation ever happens again. This stuff works!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Greer

product_meta.title: Littlebugs Lice Treatment 3-Step Easy Elimination Kit - Comb, Serum, Spray | Best Natural Head Lice & Nit Remover | Safe Removal for Kids, Mom, Family | Treat Head Lice Pesticide-Free
feature_bullets: ALL-IN-ONE LICE REMOVER KIT: Our pesticide-free natural formula eliminates louse & nits, includes a steel comb, and does not create additional resistance to future treatment.
SAFE, NATURAL, & EFFECTIVE: Safe for use on infants, toddlers, kids, even pregnant or nursing moms! Also includes instructions in Spanish!
STEP 1 - NATURAL MINT SERUM: Soothes the scalp while eliminating live lice in hair.
STEP 2 - NIT SPRAY: Naturally dissolves the glue of the nit, allowing the Littlebugs comb to free it from the hair shaft.
STEP 3 - LITTLEBUGS COMB: For final removal of lice and nit debris. One great kit to eliminate both the louse and the nit!
